lines.text: She said she didn't want me to wear clothes like this in her class. So I took 'em off.
Yah, right down to my underwear. Miss Bukowski turned this really neat shade of purple. It was kind of artistic.
You're here to train, Stacy, not exercise your glands.

For me, when I'm out there tumbling across those mats, I change. It's like a whole other kind of world. Someplace... better. When that happens, it's like nothing can touch me. I guess that's how birds feel when they're flying.
From now on, I'm a free agent. Look out girls, it's open season on Tommy Wernicke!
